requirements.description: Disciple of Beauty, Fertility, Good, Healing, Life, Light, Love, Moon, Motherhood, Nature, Plants, Protection, Sun, or Water.

text: Pray for 4 AP and pay 10 Faith.

You touch a willing creature, and they are healed of 1d4 points of Attribute damage in one attribute, 1 point of mnemonic damage, an unfavorable condition of your choosing (except \lq ~\nameref{condition:wounded} \rq and  \lq ~\nameref{condition:heavilywounded} \rq), or they can re-roll a check against poison or disease that they previously failed.
Only one of these effects work.
20 Faith, You can choose to remove a minor disease.
30 Faith, You can choose to remove a major disease, as well as the \lq ~\nameref{condition:wounded} \rq condition.
40 Faith, You can choose to remove the \lq ~\nameref{condition:heavilywounded} \rq condition.
50 Faith, You can choose to heal a permanent disability, such as permanent blindness, deafness, muteness, a malformed or missing limb, etc.
